alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Pike (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Meriwether and northwestern Pike Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 215 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Greenville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Gay, Alvaton, Rocky Mount, Saint Marks, Hilltop, Imlac, Hollonville and Wooster. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
